places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Masineni Grand
address: 15/184, Raju Rd, Kamalanagar, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh 515001, India

reviews.text: Petals restaurant food service is bad on Saturdays and charging more by not serving displayed food items. There is no welcome drink and sweet served on Saturdays. Too many staff no proper organising

The food at your hotel was really amazing. Depth of flavor and freshness was felt in every dish. Heartfelt thanks for the chef's artistry and the hard work of the team. This experience will always be remembered.

Masineni Grand: A Fusion of Elegance and Comfort

My recent stay at Masineni Grand was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted by a sense of sophistication that extended throughout my entire experience.

The hotel's architecture seamlessly blends modern design with traditional elements, creating a captivating ambiance. The staff, notably courteous and attentive, made check-in effortless and offered a warm welcome, setting the tone for my stay.

The room itself was a haven of comfort. Impeccably clean and tastefully decorated, it exuded a sense of tranquility that made it easy to unwind after a long day of travel. The bed was luxurious and provided a restful night's sleep, while the amenities provided were of top-notch quality.

One highlight was the culinary experience. The hotel's restaurant served an array of delectable dishes that tantalized the taste buds. From local delicacies to international cuisines, each meal was a delightful journey of flavors. Moreover, the presentation and service were impeccable, adding an extra touch of elegance to every dining experience.
Nice place, cleaning is good and room service is excellent. A middle class can afford the price. Stayed with my loved one and both loved this place.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Masineni Grand, and it was an experience worth celebrating. From the moment I entered the lobby, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere.

The staff at Masineni Grand went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable. Their hospitality was exceptional, and every team member was attentive, friendly, and eager to assist. It truly made me feel like a valued guest.

places_with_reviews.name: Alexander Luxury Hotel
address: 11-120, opp. Municipal Corp, Sapthagiri Circle, Sai Nagar, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh 515001, India

reviews.text:
Truly a masterpiece hotel in regards to the amenities and luxury being provided for a Tier-II city.
Frankly speaking when we had booked the place we weren’t expecting it to be at this level.
When it comes to the team they are truly friendly and ready to help, especially Mr. Rajesh who is the General Manager of the property.
Hats off to the team and do ensure to maintain the standards provided as of date always…
The service was awesome and restaurant service was done by all women really felt happy with their service. The girl who served us Vasantha she made us to felt like homely.Finaly good experience

Sorry to say it was a very bad experience we had in our stay to attend a friend's marriage Feb 2024, Very poor in customer service and management.
Adhoc charge discussion happened in during 11PM in night when night shift operater came and hav a long unpleasant experience thereafter. So
i request friends reading this post pls ensure to gather room all details in prior about, availability, occupancy duration and additional charges to avoid last minute hazzle.

Hotel location is good and rooms are of decent quality but service is very bad. Staff needs to be trained to handle customers nicely. For 2 plus persond, service provided is for just 1 person ... simple things like towels etc ... food not impressed at all ... breakfast served is cold and no info on the menu. Staff is cold shoulder attitude towards customers during breakfast. As usual need to fallowup multiple times for food.

Worst Front office Staffing. We came here for friends marriage and booked 2 rooms at this hotel. While we came here we didn't get the room for allotted time and delayed by more than 1 hour. Then they given a 1 room to freshup and another room alloted after 3 hours, in the conversation they didn't explained about extra person charge and making check out delayed.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Rajahamsa
address: Opposite APS RTC bustand Lane, Venugopal Nagar, Old Town, Old Town, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh 515001, India

reviews.text:
The place is, in one word, flashy. Rooms plush, lights dim, curtains heavy and walls adorned. A little too much for people like me. But nothing in there that made our stay bad.

However, the family that took the adjacent room to ours had to relocate to a different one. Apparently the tap system's lever there malfunctioned.

Rooms are neat. Service is good. It's near the bus stop which is in the middle of the city, so don't expect better views.
Satisfies the range of a 3 star hotel.
But price is too high. Could have got better hotels in metropolitan area for the same price. Approx 3500 per day for a couple room.
Special mention about breakfast. Complimentary breakfast is very good.

My stay at this hotel was nothing short of a nightmare. The interior of the room did not appear good, overly ornate with its walls, windows, or lighting.

First and foremost, the flush in my room was out of order, which was extremely inconvenient. The extra bed was so uncomfortable that I had trouble getting a good night's sleep.

To make matters worse, when I ventured outside of my room, the entire area had a foul and nauseating odor. It seemed as if there were serious cleanliness issues in the hotel.

The buffet was a major disappointment. The food quality was abysmal, and it left a lot to be desired. I couldn't even find a decent meal.

Overall, my experience here was unsatisfactory, and I strongly suggest avoiding scheduling a stay at this hotel.

Rooms are very neat and clean with royal look and towels are folded into two swans. The food is very delicious, fish biryani and paneer 65 is amazing, and the fried chicken is also very tasty. There is a nice rooftop restaurant along with swimming pool. I really loved the 24/7 hot water facility

Rooms are excellent and with plenty of space. Small selection of breakfast buffet but you can order a lot of things. Service is kind of slow but that didn't really matter much in my case. Bad location on the side of a road and no view in the room I got.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL GARLICA GRAND
address: 1-1338-4, Hyderabad - Bangalore Hwy, Rudrampeta, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh 515001, India

reviews.text: Located right besides highway on the service road, easy to access but have to make a U-turn of 1km if coming from Bengaluru, it can get noisy. There's a lift but didn't find a staircase! Rooms are spacious, got AC, cupboard, water kettle, and TV with Internet. Car parking is available besides hotel. Building got 4 floors and underground parking. Overall good.
Hotel and Room was hygienic with the facility of freshness. 24 hrs hot water and Free WiFi service. Management and Service boys are good manner. Value for Money.

Rooms are too good, wash area is a bit messy. It's bit over priced compared to to the same type of hotel at other place. Excellent service and very cooperative staff. Good hospitality. Situated beside highway and a bit distant from anantapur town. For dining not available at the spot you must to explore a bit. Overall experience is good.

Good hotel.  Value for money.
No breakfast
But location wise little far from bus stand and railway station.
People going towards hyderabad or bangalore in car  it's on the highway.
For me it's very near to my work place.
Use to stay in higher tarrif hotel.
This gives the same experience
Good ambience,Room cleanliness good & polite staff. Smooth Check in & Check out process

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel SR Grand
address: 6-5-246, 80 Feet Rd, Andhra Bank Colony, Ram Nagar, Maruthi Nagar, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh 515004, India

reviews.text: Very good rooms ..neat and clean..but dedicated parking for hotel I'd not available

Decent lodge with restaurant. Restaurant boasts of serving ‘bongu’ biryani (biryani cooked in a bamboo). The quality of meat (lamb in our case) was dismal which brought down the rating considerably. If one wants to taste this speciality expect to pay for the flavor (which was no great shakes either) and do not expect much for meat.
Fantastic food and nice service and with a politeness good place to visit with family nd will experience the best of it

Bad location first it placed in between houses, no privacy and rooms are also so small and having bad smell, person at desk also have bad attitude has no good response.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sri7 Inn
address: Gooty Rd, beside Sree7 Convention, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh 515001, India

reviews.text:
I would  just like to say that this is very bad hotel we have stayed in.
We had booked 2 rooms in this hotel through Agoda a day prior to our visit. Unfortunately,  we were late to reach. It was around 9.30 Pm when we reached.
When we first arrived, we were told that price shown online through agoda was very less and we were asked to pay extra amount or we need to cancel the room. As it was late, with kids and family,we had no other options other than staying. We paid extra and agreed to stay. When we went to room, we could see cockroaches moving around and we didn't get proper hot water for bathing.
Totally very bad experience of stay here.

Worst service received,, booked room on Oyo with 1140.. they charged me 1400 after reaching there,
AC wont work to adjust temperature.
The bathrooms were slippery, with all yellow stains, hairs and rubbish..

1. The worst stay I have ever stayed in my entire life. They charged me as they run a 4 star hotel. When we open the room the complete room was visible. No privacy and not recommended for family or couples to stay.
2. No TV connection. They said they disconnected the cable services since Corona days and I stayed for a night on 17 May 2023.
3. They didn't provide me a glass for drinking water. After I asked what kind of a hotel, then they gave me a disposable paper cup.
4. After I opened my suitcase for changing my clothes, I tried to close the window curtains. The complete curtain with the curtain rod had fallen down. later I fixed it and opened the bathroom where I was surprised to see the condition of the bathroom. Pathetic,  Even the flush was not working
5. Finally, the best part was, the receptionist was requesting me to give good rating while was checking out.
The owner might be least interested.
All the travel agents should take out this hotel
No cleanliness in rooms, rude staff, mosquitoes and what not, very bad experience not worth the money
Worst hotel ever visited, booked online, but they are not ready to accept booking. I paid extra money after lot of discussion

places_with_reviews.name: Neem Tree Hotel (A boutique stay)
address: Sunkanna Bhavan, Yes Bank building, Ram Nagar Flyover, Ram Nagar, Aravinda Nagar, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh 515001, India

reviews.text: the hotel staff is highly praised by many guests with their friendly and excellent service. The great location near hyway in City with easy access to transportation makes it convenient for guests. The range received positive feedback from guests. The spacious and clean rooms make for a peaceful stay

As a frequent traveller to the town i must say this hotel has to be one of the best i have stayed. They have very good rooms with corporate style interiors and facilities. The staff was well behaved and informative with travel related quires and bookings.
Best part being they have parking facility for the guests which is a big relief.
I recommend this hotel for anyone who is travelling alone/friends or even with family.

My stay at the lodging hotel was a truly exceptional experience. From the warm welcome at check-in to the impeccable service throughout, the staff went above and beyond to ensure my comfort. The room was not just a space; it was a haven of relaxation with thoughtful details. The attention to detail and genuine hospitality created a memorable stay. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone seeking a delightful blend of comfort and top-notch service.
The hotel staff is very friendly and polite. Rooms and common areas are fully hygienic and clean all the time. We enjoyed the stay to the fullest.
Honor of the property is really caring for the guest. You'll get all the comfort there. They are just amazing book the room without a second thought. Its really nearby to national highway also
